Row.Text: Unique Building for the Bolsheviks. Replaces the Constabulary. Does not reduce enemy Spy effectiveness. +10% [ICON_FOOD] Food stored upon the birth of a new citizen. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per every 5 Citizens. +15% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in the city.

Commissariats were, historically, either buildings used for military administration or for resource allocation. Generally, the Bolsheviks utilized Commissariats of the second kind - though the former was known to crop up now and then.

While the Commissariat loses the primary ability of the Constabulary it replaces, it instead fulfills a much different role. Now, the Commissariat retains some [ICON_FOOD] Food upon the birth of a new Citizen. Even more importantly, if you have 5 Citizens or more in a city, you can gain +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and upon construction your city receives +15% of its [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output. This is especially useful for completing Social Policies to access the UA's bonuses.
